CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 4;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and resides in the town of FAC , GPE region , GPE .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant instituted proceedings in the Zhovtovodskyy Town Court of Dnipropetrovsk Region against his employer , a ORG - owned company , ORG ( NORP управління будівництва ) , in order to receive salary arrears and other payments .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court found for the applicant and awarded him CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( “ UAH ” ) ( PERSON міського суду ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Zhovti Vody Town Bailiffs ' Service ( ORG виконавчої служби Жовтоводського міського управління юстиції ) initiated the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant instituted new proceedings in the same court against the same enterprise for further payments and compensation .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court found for the applicant and awarded him ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . The applicant received UAH CARDINAL , but , according to him , the rest of the awards remain unpaid .

CARDINAL . NORP By letter of DATE , ORG informed the applicant that the enforcement proceedings had been stayed because of the bankruptcy proceedings initiated against the debtor by a decision of DATE of ORG of the Dnipropetrovsk Region . ORG also stated that , according to the PERSON on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property , on DATE a ban on the forced sale of assets belonging to undertakings in which the ORG holds PERCENT of the share capital had been introduced .
CARDINAL . By the decree of CARDINAL DATE ORG liquidated the debtor company .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
